speakers.title: Node & Express.js Workshop
speakers.name: Ray Villalobos
speakers.description: Ray Villalobos, Staff Author for lynda.com will cover the basics of node.js and how to build real websites with the Express.js Framework. This is a recap of Ray's popular Fluent 2014 talk. Come learn about the future of buildling web applications.

speakers.title: Getting Started with Raspberry Pi
speakers.name: Scott Moe
speakers.description: The revolutionary credit card computer that plubs into a standard HDMI port and can ben used in countless electronics and development projects. We'll explore what it takes to get started with the Raspberry Pi and see what you can do with this amazing programmable hardware platform.
